scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --topological-dev --no-private run clean && yarn infra:rimraf temp coverage
scripts.test: yarn infra:npm-run-all -p -l lint test:unit test:depcheck test:depaudit
scripts.test:unit: yarn infra:c8 -r html -r text -r lcov uvu -r tsm --src='packages/*/src/test/ts'
scripts.test:concurrent: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --topological-dev --no-private run test && yarn coverage:merge
scripts.coveralls:push: cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls || echo 'coveralls push failed :(' && exit 0
scripts.postupdate: yarn && yarn clean && yarn build && yarn test
